languages.text: "Это абсолютно бестактная и неуместная попытка узнать секретную информацию. Я предлагаю вам быть моим военачальником, а вы меня, простите, доите на сведения? Некрасиво".
"An utterly transparent attempt to learn secret intelligence. I offer to make you my general, and you try to pump me for information? Poorly done."
languages.original_text: "Это абсолютно бестактная и неуместная попытка узнать секретную информацию. Я предлагаю вам быть моим военачальником, а вы меня, простите, доите на сведения? Некрасиво".

traits.locale_text: "An utterly transparent attempt to learn secret intelligence. I offer to make you my general, and you try to pump me for information? Poorly done."
"An utterly transparent attempt to learn secret intelligence. I offer to make you my general, and you try to pump me for information? Poorly done."
"An utterly transparent attempt to learn secret intelligence. I offer to make you my general, and you try to pump me for information? Poorly done."
"An utterly transparent attempt to learn secret intelligence. I offer to make you my general, and you try to pump me for information? Poorly done."

languages.text: “你打算获取秘密情报，你的意图实在是太明显了。我提议让你当我的指挥官，你却打算套我的话？你的手段实在是太糟糕了。”
languages.original_text: "An utterly transparent attempt to learn secret intelligence. I offer to make you my general, and you try to pump me for information? Poorly done."

traits.locale_text: “你打算获取秘密情报，你的意图实在是太明显了。我提议让你当我的指挥官，你却打算套我的话？你的手段实在是太糟糕了。”

languages.text: «Es un intento muy transparente de extraer información secreta. ¿Le ofrezco nombrarle mi general e intenta sonsacarme secretos? No es buen plan».
languages.original_text: "An utterly transparent attempt to learn secret intelligence. I offer to make you my general, and you try to pump me for information? Poorly done."

traits.locale_text: «Es un intento muy transparente de extraer información secreta. ¿Le ofrezco nombrarle mi general e intenta sonsacarme secretos? No es buen plan».

languages.text: 「ただただ純粋に機密を知りたがるとはな。私の司令官にしてやるから、情報を取り出してみてはどうだ？やり方が悪い」
languages.original_text: "An utterly transparent attempt to learn secret intelligence. I offer to make you my general, and you try to pump me for information? Poorly done."

traits.locale_text: 「ただただ純粋に機密を知りたがるとはな。私の司令官にしてやるから、情報を取り出してみてはどうだ？やり方が悪い」

languages.text: « Je vois clair dans votre jeu : vous cherchez à obtenir des renseignements secrets. Je propose de vous nommer {mf|général|générale} et en retour, vous tentez de m'extorquer des informations ? Je ne vous félicite pas. »
languages.original_text: "An utterly transparent attempt to learn secret intelligence. I offer to make you my general, and you try to pump me for information? Poorly done."

traits.locale_text: « Je vois clair dans votre jeu : vous cherchez à obtenir des renseignements secrets. Je propose de vous nommer {mf|général|générale} et en retour, vous tentez de m'extorquer des informations ? Je ne vous félicite pas. »

languages.text: "Ein komplett durchsichtiger Versuch, Geheiminformationen zu erhalten. Ich biete Euch an, mein General zu werden, und Ihr wollt mich aushorchen? Schlecht gemacht."
languages.original_text: "An utterly transparent attempt to learn secret intelligence. I offer to make you my general, and you try to pump me for information? Poorly done."

traits.locale_text: "Ein komplett durchsichtiger Versuch, Geheiminformationen zu erhalten. Ich biete Euch an, mein General zu werden, und Ihr wollt mich aushorchen? Schlecht gemacht."

languages.text: "Ayan beyan gizli bilgi edinmeye çalışıyorsun. Ben sana rütbe verip ordumun başına geçirmek istiyorum, sense benden bilgi cımbızlamak istiyorsun. Yazık."
languages.original_text: "An utterly transparent attempt to learn secret intelligence. I offer to make you my general, and you try to pump me for information? Poorly done."
